description: when starting an instance,thanks to quota exceed,we can not sucessfully start an instance,nova should point out which item(cores   , memory,CPU, etc）exceed.
title: nova should point out which quota item exceed when booting failed

comments.content: when starting an instance,thanks to quota exceed,we can not sucessfully start an instance,nova should point out which item(cores   , memory,CPU, etc）exceed.

comments.content:
This is already solved:

ERROR: Quota exceeded for instances: Requested 1, but already used 1 of 1 instances (HTTP 413)
